attributes.additional_details:
The current Spouse Visa application requirements are separating families, causing financial burdens.This is adversely affecting a lot of UK citizens, both emotionally and financially. Having a family is a human right, not a privilege.
As a single mother of 3, remarried abroad, I cannot meet the finanacial requirement due to having young children and a new born baby. This has really impacted my mental state as my Husband cannot be reunited with us. 
I would urge the Uk Government to change the spouse visa Requirements it would be beneficial for myself and many others who are facing the same situation.
